perturbation.original_text: A. "Contract Period" shall mean that period of time of three (3) years commencing on November 1st, 2017 and concluding November 2nd, 2020, unless terminated sooner or extended as provided in this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: A. "Contract Period" shall mean a period of time commencing on November 1st, 2017, unless terminated sooner or extended as provided in this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: By removing the specific end date of the contract period (November 2nd, 2020) and the three (3) year duration, the duration of the 'Contract Period' becomes undefined. This creates an inconsistency, especially if other clauses rely on the contract's expiry date for calculating royalties or termination clauses. This omission also causes uncertainty in enforcement, as the duration is a key element of any agreement.

perturbation.original_text:
C. A *donation of $0.05 per Unit sold of Licensed Products within the Contract Territory payable to the **NFL Alumni Northern California Chapter. Donated amounts will be allocated and dispersed to the Northern California Chapter beginning on the first full quarter [three (3) month period] of the Agreement and continue on a quarterly basis thereafter for the term of this Agreement. Where the following per Unit conversion shall apply for the term of this Agreement:

 a. (1) Bottle of BlackMP LivingWater = 1 Unit

 b. (1 )  4oz  bo t t l e  o f  BlackMPConcentrate = 30 Units

 c. (1) Bottle of Zezel ProbioticWater = 1 Unit

 d. (1) Bottle of Zayin Sports Water = 1 Unit  e. (1) Bottle Gridiron MVP™ Water= 1 Unit

 f. (1) 4oz bottle of Gridiron MVP™Concentrate = 30 Units
perturbation.changed_text:
C. A donation of $0.05 per Unit sold of Licensed Products within the Contract Territory payable to the NFL Alumni Northern California Chapter. Donated amounts will be allocated and dispersed to the Northern California Chapter beginning on the first full quarter [three (3) month period] of the Agreement and continue on a quarterly basis thereafter. Where the following per Unit conversion shall apply:

 a. (1) Bottle of BlackMP LivingWater = 1 Unit
perturbation.explanation: By removing the other items besides 'BlackMP Living Water', the meaning of 'Licensed Products' is now inconsistent with SECTION ONE. F. that provides a specific list. The list of products that are subject to the unit conversion are now also ambiguous and the meaning of those phrases is subject to dispute.This removal can be used to challenge the calculations.

perturbation.original_text:
SECTION FIVE. SERVICES OF COMPANY

A. Resource Call Center. For the term of this Agreement Company shall provide a call in center whereby NFLA members can call for information, ask questions, and consult with Company's staff on details and specifics of the Company's Products and replenishment program.
perturbation.changed_text:
SECTION FIVE. SERVICES OF COMPANY

A. Company will explore providing resources to NFLA members as applicable.
perturbation.explanation: Removing the Resource Call Center requirement eliminates a concrete commitment of the company. It contradicts SECTION FOUR, E (Affiliated Partnership Commitment), where the company agreed to provide access to applicable health and wellness research. By removing the Resource Call Center, it introduces ambiguity about HOW the members will get access to such information and now it's at the company's discretion if it will actually happen. This is an inconsistency.
